gameDescription: Two airship crews, navigating advanced intelligent ships, are tasked with a mission of global importance: to transport endangered pangolins from poaching hotspots in Africa to a newly-built sanctuary in Vietnam. The success of the mission, governed by each crew's decisions, could provide a critical lifeline for the world's most trafficked mammal.

blueTeam.name: The Pangolin Protectors
blueTeam.description: Experts in covert operations and delicate cargo transport.

redTeam.name: The Wildlife Warriors
redTeam.description: Masters of efficient long-distance travel and global biodistribution.

turns.scenario: As both teams prepare to retrieve pangolins from an identified poaching hotspot, they face a dilemma: conduct a stealth night operation or launch a broad daylight rescue to ward off poachers.

options.A: Conduct a stealthy night operation for minimal disturbance.
options.B: Launch a broad daylight rescue, drawing attention to the illegal poaching activity.

AA.narrative: Both teams opt for a night operation, successfully retrieving pangolins with minor disturbances. Their approach, however, fails to deter the poachers.

AB.narrative: One team conducts a stealthy rescue, while the other launches a daylight operation. The daylight rescue draws international attention to the pangolins' plight but also attracts poachers.

BA.narrative: One team launches a daylight rescue while the other carries out a night operation. The daylight team secures pangolins under the international eye, while the night team retrieves more in stealth.

BB.narrative: Both teams carry out daylight rescues, drawing global attention to the pangolins' plight. However, the increased visibility makes pangolins a more desirable target for poachers.

turns.scenario: Crossing the Indian Ocean, the airships receive a distress signal from a cargo ship carrying animals rescued from illegal trade.

options.A: Divert the course to help, risking the welfare of the pangolins on board.
options.B: Continue with the mission, alerting marine rescue services about the distressed vessel.

AA.narrative: Both teams choose to divert their course, taking on additional animals but straining their resources and compromising the pangolinsâ€™ welfare.

AB.narrative: One team diverts to help, while the other continues the mission. The diversions result in additional rescues but strain the pangolins, whereas the focused mission ensures the pangolins' welfare.

BA.narrative: One team continues the mission, while the other deviates. The team continuing the mission ensures the pangolins' safety, but the diverting team saves other trafficked animals, making a significant impact.

BB.narrative: Both teams opt to continue the mission, focusing on the welfare of the pangolins. Marine rescue services assist the distressed vessel, transforming tragedy into a collective rescue operation.

turns.scenario: Upon reaching Vietnam, the team must decide between a swift but conspicuous delivery or a slower, stealthy entrance to avoid attention from potential traffickers.

options.A: Opt for a swift, conspicuous delivery to limit the pangolins' journey time.
options.B: Choose a slow, stealthy entrance to prevent drawing attention.

AA.narrative: Both teams choose a swift delivery. The pangolins reach their sanctuary quickly, but the activity draws attention, risking future operations.

AB.narrative: One team quickly delivers its cargo, while the other uses stealth. The fast team's action draws attention, affecting the stealth team's operation. Next time, they would need to synchronize better.

BA.narrative: One team goes stealth, while the other delivers swiftly. The quick delivery distracts attention from the stealth operation, ensuring a smooth operation for all. They receive commendation for their strategic thinking.

BB.narrative: Both teams opt for stealth, successfully delivering the pangolins without drawing attention. This unprecedented mission becomes a global symbol of hope for wildlife conservation.
